org.lindbergframework.persistence.context
Class ClassPathXmlLinpConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.lindbergframework.core.context.ConfigurationRepository
      org.lindbergframework.persistence.context.AbstractLinpConfiguration
          org.lindbergframework.persistence.context.XmlLinpConfiguration
              org.lindbergframework.persistence.context.ClassPathXmlLinpConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configuration, ConfigurationInitializer, LinpConfiguration, XmlLinpConfigurationInitializer
public class ClassPathXmlLinpConfiguration
extends XmlLinpConfiguration

Linp configuration implementation for configuration file on class path. The XML schema is defined in http://www.lindbergframework.org/schema/lindberg-config.xsd

Author:
Victor Lindberg

Constructor Detail

ClassPathXmlLinpConfiguration

public ClassPathXmlLinpConfiguration()

ClassPathXmlLinpConfiguration

public ClassPathXmlLinpConfiguration(java.lang.String xmlResource)
Creates a ClassPathXmlLinpConfiguration using a xmlResource configuration on class path. e.g. new ClassPathXmlLinpConfiguration(org/myproject/resource/lindberg-config.xml) e.g. new ClassPathXmlLinpConfiguration(org/myproject/resource/config-file-name.xml)

Parameters:
xmlResource - configuration file on class path.
